text: ninnal bharyamare sparsikkukayea, avarute vivahamulyam niscayikkukayea ceyyunnatinu mumpayi ninnalavarumayulla bandham verpetuttiyal (mah‌r nalkattatinre peril) ninnalkk kurramilla. ennal avarkk ninnal maryadayanusaricc jivitavibhavamayi entenkilum nalkentatan‌. kalivullavan tanre kalivanusariccum, nerukkamullavan tanre sthitikkanusariccum. sad‌vrttaraya alukalkk itearu badhyatayatre
